mainEntity.name: What is the warranty on Voxpure?

acceptedAnswer.text: Each bottle comes with a 1-year limited warranty covering manufacturing defects.

mainEntity.name: How do I request a replacement?

acceptedAnswer.text: Contact your retailer or reach out to support with your product serial number.
Unused items in original packaging can be returned within 30 days. Faulty items qualify for replacement or refund.

mainEntity.name: Where can I find the product barcode or serial number?

acceptedAnswer.text: It's printed on the outside of the box — keep it for support.

mainEntity.name: Can smart water bottles really purify water?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes. Voxpure uses deep-clean UV-C light (280nm) to neutralize 99.9% of bacteria, viruses, and pathogens. It purifies water at a molecular level without filters or chemicals.

mainEntity.name: How long does UV-C purification take in smart bottles?

acceptedAnswer.text: Voxpure completes a sterilization cycle in just 60 seconds. This ensures effective disinfection while preserving battery life for up to 60 cycles per charge.

mainEntity.name: How do UV-C water bottles work?

acceptedAnswer.text: UV-C LEDs emit a short-wave light that penetrates and disrupts the DNA/RNA of microorganisms. Voxpure’s smart cap activates the cycle with a tap—no filters, no waiting.

mainEntity.name: Benefits of using smart water bottles with UV purification

acceptedAnswer.text: Voxpure offers pathogen-free water, eliminates single-use plastic bottles, and requires no filter replacements. Ideal for gyms, airports, and daily use.

mainEntity.name: Where to buy USB-C rechargeable water bottles in Hong Kong?

acceptedAnswer.text: Voxpure is available online and through select retail partners in Hong Kong. Every bottle includes a fast-charging USB-C cable and a 1-year warranty.
